[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@boba-cli/list](./list.md) &gt; [ListModel](./list.listmodel.md)

## ListModel class

Composite list component with filtering, pagination, spinner, and help.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ListModel<T extends Item> 
```
